title: What are some inappropriate seeming K-pop songs which are actually not? - Quora

response.answer_text: Red Velvet - Ice Cream Cake Many people see the song as being sexual in English. Many people think the song is about oral sex. It is not. Even many korean fans confirmed its about a sweet kiss. It’s just the English translation isn’t exactly the same as the korean one. I also don’t think they’d let Yeri (who was 16 I believe at the time) sing a song about that.
